The 1980s in New York is scheduled to fight gangs, violence and large betrayals. Sonny (Justin Chon) and Steven (Kevin Wu) are schoolmates and best friends. It's 1983, they join the gang Green Dragons in Chinatown. Both grow rapidly in the world of crime, calling the unexpected attention of city police.
